title: Advanced Users Tool Box No Ads
creator: Kamron K.

extendedInfo.description: No annoying or intrusive advertisements in apps from Kamron K. I see them as un-professional and irritating, so I am not going to burden my users with them.Professional Android Tools for Professional Android UsersAndroid device file management made simple. Whether you want to get rid of unwanted files or software, or check on your sd card manually through file browsing, this tool box makes it easy to do so with simple user interfaces, and dynamic features. This application is developed with the users in mind. We get emails from current users and our discussion will always include the question "What would you like this application to do?", because your needs, are our assignments. Rooted users have more functionality with this tool box, because you have access to wipe your current cache.Has Following Features:~ Email Files~ Multi-Select~ Zip and Un-Zip Files~ APK Installer~ Delete Files~ Search~ Battery level~ Market History Cleaner <>~ Dalvik/GEN Cache Cleaner <>With this tool box you may send any file to another user or even to your home computer for back up. Browse through files on your device, or sd card, multi-select for convenient deleting or zipping files into compressed files for transfer or back up.Features in development:- Feature Request Form- Help/How To resources- Functional phone number =/- Give me your ideas or what you would like to seeMy name is Kamron, and I love software. I work a typical full time job, college, children, and enjoy the challenge of android development as a hobby. I want to develop useful tools for everyone and myself. The best tools are easy to use and intuitive, please help me make my applications better by providing feedback in a rating or an email. If you rate me a four star or lower, i trust your opinion and really would appreciate reasoning in the low ratings. Like I said, please help me make this better.

reviews.title: Helps me keep files organized. And works great wit my phone.
reviews.comment: Its a must have.
reviews.author: repo jones

reviews.title: great tool/small space
reviews.comment: like how theres no ad popups. im unrooted. was rooted.prev. but messed things up, and had to fix. Please put in a light background theme and some features useful to unrooted as.well as rooted users. keep.up the good work.
reviews.author: Tony Pitrucelle

reviews.title: Good app just to have
reviews.comment: This app is great for clearing delvic /gen advanced cleaner/ cache if you didn\'t do it because u were worried what it was or would do if u uploaded a new rom and backed up yr factory settings.  Even afterwords say you try 10 apps over a period of time then delete them delete the d.cache again and you will get more rom/phone memory
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC EVO DESIGN
reviews.comment: I\'m rating this app with a 5, it would of been a 4 but the man that built the app had the balls to say sorry for not updating his apps that he gives away for free, thank you for all your hard work for us end-users, we don\'t say it enough to you designers. Mabey you can make a power saving app the the user has complete control over, cause I hate having to turn my display back on or my ringers back on cause I didn\'t have a choice on what\'s on or off. What good is power saving app if u can\'t c who\'s calling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: IM not sure how to use it yet but so far so good i found files that i thought were deleted long ago & i was able to delete them. So ya thumbs up

reviews.title: Suggestions
reviews.comment: I like ur tool box. But i wish i didn\'t have to install 2 apps to get all the features. Ideas 1Make the UI sleeker, and clean2Apps2sd3An applock. To add passwords to certain apps(maybe also a vault for pics and videos)4An option to have the battery percentage in notifications bar. With a widget bar that could be customized for the controls you like.. Brightness, sound, flashlight, and so on. If u could combine yours and zdbox then it would be 5 stars amazing
